entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Coronation
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:39 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coronation 09:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -16.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -18.7°C
Wind: SSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
